description: line drawing with Christ at center right, flanked by John the Baptist and an angel, who draws a cloth over Christ's head; God in clouds at top center; dove above Christ's head; other figures at left, seated and standing; figure in profile from PR at center with hands in prayer
marks:
Inscription

on mount, bottom left, in pencil: [
medium: Pen and brown ink and gray wash
title: Baptism of Christ
